label: 進物所
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: An office belonging to the Imperial Table Office (Naizenshi).  The Shinmotsudokoro, located close to the Emperor's living quarters and functioning↓as a kind of butler's pantry, forwarded food prepared in the Imperial Table Office, sometimes after reheating it or performing other simple final preparations (p. 811). [内膳司]
